models.name: Purosangue
models.technical specifications: 6.5L V12 engine, 725 HP, 716 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s, top speed 310 km/h, 8-speed dual-clutch, AWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €12,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Purosangue is Ferraris first-ever four-door, four-seater production model, blending SUV practicality with Ferrari performance.

models.name: 488 Pista
models.technical specifications: 3.9L twin-turbo V8 engine, 720 HP, 770 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.85s, top speed 340 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €10,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The 488 Pista is inspired by Ferraris racing experience in the 488 Challenge and GTE series, with the most powerful V8 in Ferrari history at its release.

models.name: LaFerrari
models.technical specifications: 6.3L V12 hybrid engine with electric motor, combined 963 HP, 900 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.6s, top speed 350 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international license, €20,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: LaFerrari was Ferraris first hybrid hypercar, combining a V12 engine with an F1-derived HY-KERS system for instant power delivery.

models.name: Aventador SVJ
models.technical specifications: 6.5L V12 engine, 770 HP, 720 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.8s, top speed 350 km/h, 7-speed ISR transmission, AWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €12,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Aventador SVJ holds the Nürburgring Nordschleife lap record for production cars, set in 2018.

models.name: Huracán STO
models.technical specifications: 5.2L V10 engine, 640 HP, 565 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.0s, top speed 310 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €10,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Huracán STO (Super Trofeo Omologata) is a road-legal version of Lamborghini’s Super Trofeo EVO race car.

models.name: Urus Performante
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 666 HP, 850 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s, top speed 306 km/h, 8-speed automatic, AWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €8,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Urus Performante is one of the fastest SUVs in the world and set a Pikes Peak hill climb record for production SUVs in 2022.

models.name: 765 LT
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 755 HP, 800 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.8s, top speed 330 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €10,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The 765LT (Longtail) is a lighter, more track-focused version of the 720S, with over 80 kg weight reduction and extreme aerodynamics.

models.name: P1
models.technical specifications: 3.8L twin-turbo V8 engine + electric motor, combined 903 HP, 900 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.8s, top speed 350 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international license, €20,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The McLaren P1 was part of the 'Holy Trinity' of hypercars alongside the LaFerrari and Porsche 918 Spyder, featuring F1-style hybrid technology.

models.name: Senna
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 800 HP, 800 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.7s, top speed 335 km/h, 7-speed dual-clutch, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international license, €18,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: Named after legendary F1 driver Ayrton Senna, this car was built for maximum performance and aerodynamic efficiency on track.

models.name: 992 GT3 RS
models.technical specifications: 4.0L naturally aspirated flat-six engine, 525 HP, 465 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.2s, top speed 296 km/h, 7-speed PDK, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €10,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The 992 GT3 RS uses F1-style active aerodynamics, including a drag reduction system (DRS) — a first for a street-legal Porsche.

models.name: Carrera GT
models.technical specifications: 5.7L V10 engine, 612 HP, 590 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.9s, top speed 330 km/h, 6-speed manual, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international license, €20,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Carrera GT features a carbon fiber monocoque chassis and a race-derived V10 originally developed for Formula 1.

models.name: Cayenne Turbo GT
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 640 HP, 850 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s, top speed 300 km/h, 8-speed Tiptronic S, AWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €8,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Cayenne Turbo GT is Porsches most powerful SUV and once held the Nürburgring lap record for production SUVs.

models.name: Vantage
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 665 HP, 800 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.4s, top speed 325 km/h, 8-speed automatic, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €10,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The 2024 Vantage features Aston Martins most powerful V8 ever in a Vantage model and a completely redesigned interior.

models.name: Valkyrie
models.technical specifications: 6.5L naturally aspirated V12 hybrid engine, 1160 HP, 900 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 2.5s, top speed 354 km/h, 7-speed sequential, RWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international license, €25,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The Valkyrie was co-developed with Red Bull Racing and designed by Adrian Newey, featuring F1-level aerodynamics and performance.

models.name: DBX707
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 707 HP, 900 Nm torque, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s, top speed 310 km/h, 9-speed automatic, AWD
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international license, €8,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The DBX707 is the worlds most powerful luxury SUV, blending Aston Martin craftsmanship with supercar-level performance.

models.name: BMW M2 CS
models.technical specifications: 3.0L inline-6 twin-turbo engine, 530 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.8s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €15,000
models.interesting facts: Tracks-focused edition of the M2 with 30kg weight reduction and upgraded carbon-fibre body panels

models.name: BMW M3 Competition
models.technical specifications: 3.0L inline-6 twin-turbo engine, 510 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.9s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €15,000
models.interesting facts: Features a carbon-fibre roof, 650 Nm of torque and is available in both RWD and xDrive variants

models.name: BMW M5 CS
models.technical specifications: 4.4L twin-turbo V8 engine, 635 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.0s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €25,000
models.interesting facts: Most powerful production BMW M car ever at launch; weight reduced 70kg vs M5 Competition; features carbon fibre bodywork and exclusive Gold Bronze trim accents

models.name: Audi R8
models.technical specifications: 5.2L V10 engine, 620 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.2s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 27, valid international driving licence, security deposit €20,000
models.interesting facts: Naturally aspirated V10 mid-engine layout; production version of a car developed with motorsport DNA and reaches over 330km/h

models.name: Audi RS3 ABT
models.technical specifications: 2.5L five-cyl turbo engine, 500 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.3s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving licence, security deposit €12,000
models.interesting facts: Prepared by ABT Sportsline to increase the stock RS3 power up to 500HP with upgraded intercooler, exhaust and aero kit; limited edition in many markets.

models.name: Audi RS Q8 Performance
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 640 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.6s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €30,000
models.interesting facts: Most powerful combustion-engine SUV from Audi Sport; set a Nürburgring Nordschleife lap of 7:36.698 for production SUVs

models.name: Mercedes-AMG GTR bs
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine, 720 HP, 0-100 km/h in 3.2sh
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €50,000
models.interesting facts: Most extreme road-going AMG to date, with track-derived aerodynamics, over 800Nm of torque and only ~1,615kg kerb weight

models.name: Mercedes-AMG ONE
models.technical specifications: 1.6L V6 turbo + hybrid system, 1,063 HP, 0-100 km/h in 2.9s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €500,000
models.interesting facts: Formula 1 derived powertrain, only 275 units planned, active aerodynamics with DRS and push-rod suspension

models.name: Mercedes-AMG G63 Mansory
models.technical specifications: 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine (tuned), 850 HP, 0-100 km/h in 4.5s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving licence, security deposit €80,000
models.interesting facts: Limited-edition Mansory conversion of the G-Class; only 10 units built with 1,000 Nm torque and full carbon wide-body kit

models.name: Cullinan
models.technical specifications: 6.75L V12 twin-turbo engine, 563 hp, 0-100 km/h in 5.2 s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 25, valid international driving license, €15,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: The suspension system uses cameras and sensors to read the road ahead and smooth out bumps before you hit them. The ride is tuned to feel like you are gliding.

models.name: Phantom
models.technical specifications: 6.75L twin-turbo V12 engine, 563 HP, 0-100 km/h in 5.1s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid driving licence, security deposit €100,000
models.interesting facts: Hand-built at Goodwood with over 44,000 exterior paint colour options and bespoke craftsmanship throughout

models.name: Wraith
models.technical specifications: 6.6L V12 twin-turbo engine, 624 HP, 0-100 km/h in 4.6s
models.rental conditions: Minimum age 30, valid international driving license, €20,000 deposit
models.interesting facts: Most powerful production Rolls-Royce at its launch; debuted with 'Satellite-Aided Transmission' using GPS to pre-select gears
